Original: I'm a travelling animal tamer! I love
animals. They never lie, and they
help me out in the dungeons!
[Page]
But my friend Betty, the lion queen,
won't come no matter how much I call
her... Something must've happened!
[Page]
So I set out in search of Betty.
And I heard she might be at this
[Color:5]Cloudy Stronghold[Color:0] place.
[Page]
But it's too far to fly there on
Peewee! So I want you to use your
skyship to look for her. For Betty.
[Page]
She loves eatin' and has a great nose!
So if you put food [Color:5]somewhere high up
with a strong wind[Color:0], she'll smell it!
[Page]
What kinda food? Oh, she'll eat
anything! She's a queen, after all!
Okay, good luck out there!
Translation: I'm a travelling animal tamer! I love
animals. They never lie, and they
help me out in the dungeons!
[Page]
But my friend Betty, the lion queen,
won't come no matter how much I call
her... Something must've happened!
[Page]
So I set out in search of Betty.
And I heard she might be at this
[Color:5]Cloudy Stronghold[Color:0] place.
[Page]
But it's too far to fly there on
Peewee! So I want you to use your
skyship to look for her. For Betty.
[Page]
She loves eatin' and has a great nose!
So if you put food [Color:5]somewhere high up
with a strong wind[Color:0], she'll smell it!
[Page]
What kinda food? Oh, she'll eat
anything! She's a queen, after all!
Okay, good luck out there!

Original: Someone said they saw Betty in this
place called the Cloudy Stronghold
I want you to look for her there.
[Page]
If you put food down [Color:5]somewhere high
up where strong winds blow[Color:0], I'm sure
she'll smell it and come out!
Translation: Someone said they saw Betty in this
place called the Cloudy Stronghold
I want you to look for her there.
[Page]
If you put food down [Color:5]somewhere high
up where strong winds blow[Color:0], I'm sure
she'll smell it and come out!

Original: Oh, did it work? Did you find Betty,
the lion queen?
Translation: Oh, did it work? Did you find Betty,
the lion queen?

Original: Huh? You beat her? Wait, you really
managed to beat Betty!? Huh... Was
that really her?
[Page]
A white beast... with horns growing
out of its eyes? That sounds similar,
but Betty wears a big ribbon.
[Page]
Maybe the guy who saw her didn't
really see her? Well, at least I
know now that Betty's not there.
[Page]
Anyway, that's all for my request!
I'll tell the lady you finished it
so you can get your reward.
[Page]
But about that fake? I think it's the
same kind of monster as Betty. Maybe
you can lure more out the same way!
[Page]
Though I guess I'm back to where I
started... I'm gonna keep looking
for Betty! Good luck, guys!
Translation: Huh? You beat her? Wait, you really
managed to beat Betty!? Huh... Was
that really her?
[Page]
A white beast... with horns growing
out of its eyes? That sounds similar,
but Betty wears a big ribbon.
[Page]
Maybe the guy who saw her didn't
really see her? Well, at least I
know now that Betty's not there.
[Page]
Anyway, that's all for my request!
I'll tell the lady you finished it
so you can get your reward.
[Page]
But about that fake? I think it's the
same kind of monster as Betty. Maybe
you can lure more out the same way!
[Page]
Though I guess I'm back to where I
started... I'm gonna keep looking
for Betty! Good luck, guys!

Original: Huh? You'll see me off? Nah, I'd be
too embarrasssed! Just make sure you
get your reward, okay?
Translation: Huh? You'll see me off? Nah, I'd be
too embarrasssed! Just make sure you
get your reward, okay?
